title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – the ultimate gaming companion! This keyboard combines the tactile click of a blue mechanical switch with the smoothness of a membrane for an unparalleled typing experience.

The OLED Smart Display takes customization to the next level, allowing you to display customizable gifs, game info, and even Discord messages. With per-key RGB illumination, you can light up your gaming setup in style.

Crafted from aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, this keyboard is as durable as it is stylish. The premium magnetic wrist rest provides full palm support and comfort for those long gaming sessions.

Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, this keyboard is perfect for gaming or general use. And with an IP32 water resistance rating, you can trust that it will withstand even the most intense gaming sessions.

Don't settle for an ordinary keyboard – upgrade to the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard today!
